title: The Idiot's Guide to Juneteenth | 6/20/22
description:
For Juneteenth, Glenn reviews the holiday's history and tells some of the stories of America's history that you likely haven't heard before. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss the latest horrible advice to avoid catching monkeypox and the ongoing predator behavior coming from Disney. Glenn exposes the Left's hypocrisy on who's to blame for high gas prices and offers solutions that the Left is ignoring. Glenn recalls a quote from Michelle Obama from 2008 and how much it has come true. Glenn discusses a WEF adviser whom the Left adores, Yuval Noah Harari, who has terrifying views on the future of humanity. Glenn ponders the biblical story of the Tower of Babel and relates it to the current day.
